topic.title: 4CHAN NEWFAGS: ASK FOR HELP HERE
topic.body: HOW DOES IT FEEL TO BE A NEWFAG AGAIN, FAGGOT?

topic.title: Spread the word guys! It's now or never
topic.body:
This new influx of people isn't going to last forever. If we want to keep growing this place, we need to tell people about it. People wont stay on a platform if its completely dead, so the only time to grow it is right now, today. 
4Chan is a good place to start. Direct people to 0chan, 8chan, and other alternatives.
Spread the word on twitter if you can, reddit, wherever. Tell friends.

1610152196_1NZftAz9VSawGF5JgMYGFv4ByoKEa.body:
> [styromaniac](#comment_2848_16NS3rBdW9zpLmLSQoD8nLTtNVsRFtVBhd): You could try, but I don't think he's interested in alternative platforms.

The dude can barely access twitter on his own

1610153657_1HesgY39DUQrf3M1WCn6q66f69VRR.body:
> [fuktrannyjannies](#comment_1_1LAqecRUXNt6Y4mWAAfCrpaa1o8X3S3gbe): Here you go, OP. Faggot. [...]

oy vey

1610154957_1HesgY39DUQrf3M1WCn6q66f69VRR.body:
> [giantwhitewolf](#comment_1_14YX6G8mox8V5PuR2YbrkK4Y3sHvhN5EyK): gay ass nigger why i cant post images

Zero talk is the normie friendly shit. you can find the 4chan image board on zerosites faggot

1. Activate "ZeroSites" (Left side of screen)
2. Sort by popular, and under services, look for something called Kaffiene Search
3. Search "0chan" in Kaffiene search, use the first result.

> [sirlotaplot](#comment_33_18UukzxVzEwd9ugyvKWYe2vud77GyL72Px): watcha doing there, glowie?http://localhost:43110/0chan.bit is the real link, don't trust any exit links (links going to other addresses than http://localhost:43110 or http://127.0.0.1:43110)

Good call, I'm new here too, ignore what I posted

> [sirlotaplot](#comment_35_18UukzxVzEwd9ugyvKWYe2vud77GyL72Px): no problem mate, just trying to protect people from honey pots, back during the 8chan influx some journos deanonymized a bunch of people because they either didn't use Tor or clicked exit links to honey pots [...]

Thanks man, your doing gods work.

> [namvata55](#comment_21_13UWQ2EY7X5z4xbTKhzssojJWsLL1t5Sqk): There has to be a name for this kind of fallacy by now I just don't know what it is

The SEETHE fallacy

1610164924_1PwdA37XmcR2pMjL4SfCbmwLnt29z.body: Not likely to happen, but its important

1610272179_1BAG93hXwWmaDRyjYCGP8QLpwZ6YX.body: Zeronet is certainly more anonymous than the normal web, but its not designed for that. If you are looking to be anonymous, check the tor browser

1610507385_1HK2gCWJmrTvacZbHqEC27oVygDjU.body:
> [mxh69420](#comment_44_1HK2gCWJmrTvacZbHqEC27oVygDjUohzdx): then i guess its time we moved zeronet to a dht, id start writing some pull requests but i have no idea how dhts work so i have to figure that out first

I'll help anon. In fact, a lot of us here will. Make a post on this forum so we can all work on it collaboratively

1610611550_1ASwoyvUC5DBAECJFQ7WqZVazYdo1.body: There is a search function, its called Kaffiene Search. Go on ZeroSites and sort by popular

> [reichama](#comment_63_19M1Unu2z3j9WyiQ1vcgG6yGnPRmTkUkVe): True, a working search engine is essential to the whole eco-system. If you can't find useful information on here, it might as well not exist.  [...]

Kaffiene Search

1610876302_14xmVmzUMAx4egBicMbRNkqkrrgRg.body: Down for me too. Hope your buckled in and invited as many anons as you could

> [texas](#comment_4_14xmVmzUMAx4egBicMbRNkqkrrgRgLFgYg): Letting ZeroNet be known on the #pol IRC chat, but there's really only ever 30-50 people in there. We're on our own now.

I'm happy some people have stuck around. It'd be lonely here otherwise
